root.str: Adds Lumifiber Trim to the Flash. NC use only.

Cloak does not drain while stationary, but prevents use of primary weapons while equipped. While moving, cloak lasts up to 14 seconds. When drained, recharges to full in 12 seconds while cloaked and stationary, or in 10 seconds while uncloaked.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 25 rounds.
Wearable by all non-Max classes. VS use only.
Adds 8 rounds to the default magazine size.
Deploy a Signal Scanner relay within the area
Reduces the acquire timer of the Sunderer by 90 seconds.
Deploys an Anti-Air Phalanx turret that may be manned by allied players. TR only.
You like benefits; we like to pay rent this month.
Capture control point A by staying near it.
Unlocks access to Scout Rifles. Combat Medic only.
Increases afterburner fuel replenishment rate by 15%.
Adds Hubcaps TR003 to your Sunderer. (DNT)
Apply the single use Desert Scrub v1 camo pattern to your weapon. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Reduces the timer for acquiring MAX armor by 270 seconds.
The Illumniated Apex Helmet is based on ancient but effective designs that originated on Earth hundreds of years ago. NC use only.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.225 seconds.

<font color="#00FFAA">Representative Nalla:</font> We at Nascent Expeditions are equipped to handle your shipping and transit needs. Even for a pair of old, layered-cotton legwear. Drop to the surface and kick up some dust in a Harasser, the distraction should help our teams on the surface unearth the minerals required to continue work on a new facility.

Back when I was... eh... well, way back. We used to play this game, SPRK-33 and me. You nab some kills with a certain kind of weapon, then switch to something else, and keep doing that over and over. Each time, the challenge gets a little bit tougher. Something to keep us entertained, you know? Anyway, how about you give it a shot. I'll make it worth your time, and SPRK-33 would probably get a kick out of it, too.



This mission's objectives update 7 times, each requiring a new weapon type to complete.
Apply the single use Temperate Chaparral camo pattern to your weapon. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Customize your Magrider with Gold Carapace Plating. VS use only.

You'd be out of your gourd to not rock this cyan-eyed jack-o'-lantern helmet.
+10% xp when worn
This item is only usable during Nanite of the Living Dead events.
Customize your Flash with this glowing antenna ball. NC use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 70 rounds.
Single Use 艾美瑞什 Leaf Vehicle Camo

Single use consumable. Carry up to 2 on the field between resupplies.
The Flash XS-1 is a lightly armored, single-passenger vehicle designed for rapid deployment anywhere on the battlefield.
Apply the Temperate Forest camo pattern to your armor. All factions can use this gear.
North Western Warpgate under assault by [*faction*].
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 540 rounds.
Medics can quickly heal damage that has been done to allied troops keeping in the fight longer.
Decreases the time needed to reload weapon by 6.25%
Reduces damage taken from flak by 18% and infantry small arms fire 50%.
The Illuminated Apex Helmet is based on ancient but effective designs that originated on Earth hundreds of years ago. TR use only.
Customize your soldier's voice with this Grizzled Voice Pack. NC Male use only.

The Terran Republic's Heavy Carbine project resulted in the HC1 Cougar. Utilizing a higher caliber cartridge than its LC cousins, the Cougar possesses unparalleled stopping power amongst other Terran carbines up to medium range.
Earn a Copper Medal on 5 different weapons.
Upon being revived or when reviving another player, you or your target become cloaked for the next 3 seconds. Firing your weapon will remove this effect.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 7.5%

//// The New Conglomerate Field Commander is waiting for you at our Warpgate on the planet Auraxis. To meet with them, proceed to the Warpgate Terminal and choose an available continent to travel to. The tides of war determine which continents are accessible at any given time.
Normal fall damage now starts at 40 meters and lethal fall damage starts near 120 meters. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip.</font>
Increases the strength of the air brakes on the Galaxy by 5%.
Adds a spare tire to the back of the Sunderer. TR use only.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Chrome Fairy Female Hood Ornament.
Apply the Tiger Stripe camo pattern to your armor. TR use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 120 rounds.
Friends and Outfits - PlanetSide 2 Basic Training
Customize your soldier's voice with this Gruff Voice Pack. NC Female use only.
Decreases the time needed to reload weapon by 8.75%
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 16 missiles.
While in a squad, additional spawn locations will display under the Squad Spawns list on the map.
The all-purpose Fission VSH7 features rudimentary lock-on technology for enemy armor and aircraft.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a "T" Gold Hood Ornament.
Next Rank: Reduces damage taken from enemy fire, also reduces reuse cooldown timer from 42 to 39 seconds.

Deploy a temporary jump booster onto the battlefield for 30 seconds. Allies near the booster have greatly increased jump height.

Light Assault Tactical slot. Single use consumable. Carry up to 1 on the field between resupplies. This item expires at the end of the Campaign.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 9.5%.
This customization adds a White decal to the cockpit glass. NC use only.
Gunports allow Sunderer passengers to use small window mounted weapons.
Increases fuel capacity and regeneration speed by 14%.
Turning this on will make your current resource balance always visible on the HUD. (Default: Off)
Adds cosmetic plating to the cockpit area. TR use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 1575 rounds.
Apply the single use Indar Highlands v1 camo pattern to your armor. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Your petition for squad leadership has been declined.
Heavy Assault infantry carry anti-vehicle rocket launchers, light machineguns, and have an improved nanite shield for absorbing damage.
Use an assault rifle to kill enemy players.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 16 rounds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 30 rounds.
The versatile Solstice VE3 is an effective carbine suitable for most situations. VS use only.
Apply the single use Jungle Forest camo pattern to your weapon. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Failed to set the squad leader.

Reduces the duration of Concussion, Flash, and EMP Grenades used against you 75%, and you are no longer affected by your own Flash, Concussion, or EMP grenades. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip.</font>
Prevent Hossin from being locked by gaining 50% territory control

Interacting with allied base turrets or spitfire turrets embed them with firewalls which must be disarmed by enemy infiltrators before hacking. Firewalls last 360 seconds and grant turrets an additional 25% maximum health. <font color="#dc9c36">Infiltrator only.</font>
Apply the Cyber Wire camo pattern to your armor. TR use only.

Legal possession of an Auraxium Chainblade is considered a badge of honor amongst the Terran Republic. Only the most revered TR soldiers will ever wield this powerful and highly desired miniature chainsaw.
Further increases the size of the Nano-Efficient Cloak's capacitor.
You can now wield the soundtrack of failure. Apply liberally to your fallen foes. All factions can use this gear.
Adds 12 rounds to the default magazine size.
They've pushed us out of the facility!
The powerful NC15 Phoenix uses a camera guided missile that allows the user to adjust its trajectory mid-flight. NC use only.
Downed teammates can be revived by using the alternate fire mode of the Medical Applicator.

The empires of Auraxis celebrate as three new Containment Sites come online on Esamir, neutralizing the storm that has battered the continent for months. Nanite Systems continues to search for Foster, their former representative on Sanctuary, who disappeared after attempting to use the Esamir recovery effort to hide mistakes of the past. Meanwhile Archivist Dolan, an earlier victim of Foster's ambition, exerts her influence from afar to earn favor with the Black Market vendors and Nanite Systems Operatives.
Single Use Pine Forest Vehicle Camo
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 18 rockets.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 800 rounds.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.15 seconds.
<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> I'm seeing your visuals now, very similar to The Shattered Warpgate.
For experienced soldiers who have been battling since Launch.
<font color="#00FFAA">Malfunctioning Spy Drone:</font> Hello, xXPlanetManXx. Data download beginning now. Please prevent interruptions during this process.
Join your match from the Outfit War screen.
Increases the hill climbing ability of the Flash by 15%.
Adds 3 rockets to the default magazine size.
The Recon Detection Device's dart pulses every 2.75 seconds to momentarily detect the location of fast-moving enemies, including cloaked infiltrators, in a 35 meter radius for 30 seconds.
Improves thruster efficiency, increasing total air time by 4 seconds.
This customization adds a Chrome decal to the cockpit glass. All factions can use this gear.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. NC use only.
Apply the Snakeskin camo pattern to your armor. VS use only.
Apply the single use Indar Rock camo pattern to your weapon. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Further reduces the reuse timer of the EMP Spiker
Further increases the speed of health regeneration
Adds 10 rounds to the default magazine size.
Grants access to a single-use Restoration Kit which regenerates health for 12 seconds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 2 bombs.

The TR's Advanced Precision Scope 10x is responsible for record-setting long distance kills on Auraxis. It comes equipped with a standard mil-dot reticle.

Hold Sprint to steady aim.
Applies a decal to your armor. TR use only.
Reduces NMG's full recharge time to 24 seconds.
The video uploading system has a bad configuration.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 540 rounds.
Adds Hubcaps VS005 to your Flash. (DNT)
An imposing set of horns for a helmet.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a "6" Hood Ornament.
Increases the reserve ammo of your rocket launchers by 3 magazines, and holstered rocket launchers will auto-reload every 8 seconds.
Activate optics to engage Infrared night vision.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. All factions can use this decal.
Wearable by all non-Max classes. TR use only.
Adds 6 rounds to the default magazine size.
Customize the colors of the facility-related elements in the UI (objectives, terminal indicators, etc.).
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 18 missiles.
Modified Drop Pod shell with an in-built heater for cold-weather deployments. All factions can use this gear.
Adds 15 rounds to the default magazine size.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 18 rounds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 112 rockets.
Improves the Mosquito's ability to engage ground targets by increasing its hover strength and power of vertical thrusters.
Small explosive device that is projected by the user.
Unlock performance upgrades that increase the vertical thrust of the vehicle.
Increases the time required for seeking weapons to establish a lock by 1.5 seconds, prevents the vehicle being auto detected on the mini-map and blocks enemy Engagement Radars.

In a singular burst of energy, a Warpgate has detonated, creating a shockwave powerful enough to sunder all of northeastern Esamir. This event has ushered forth unstable geysers; melted previously frozen rivers; infused the land with a mysterious, ancient energy; and has given birth to new, alien plantlife. In the midst of this calamity, Nanite Systems has unveiled new "Haven" outpost technology and coordinates with the warring factions to establish a new base of operations south of the blast site, benefiting all parties involved. With the blessing of your superior officers, Nanite Systems extends an invitation to assist them in uncovering this new environment's mysteries.
Repairs 1% every second. Damage disables repairs for 8 seconds.
<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> I have been informed that you successfully completed the contract. Satisfactory work operative, payment is en route.
Apply the single use India Scrub camo pattern to your armor. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Increases the top speed of the Lightning by 8 KPH.
Improved weight capacity reduces the speed penalty for carrying heavy weapons.
Your zipcode is currently not on file and is required to purchase items with your wallet. Please enter it below and press submit.
When thrown will produce a large smoke plume capable of providing cover for a short period of time.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 11 shells.
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the Sunderer. NC use only.
Using a red dot reticle with 3.4x optical magnification, the TR's Holographic Dot Sight performs well in close and mid-range combat scenarios.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 420 rounds.

Activate to burn fuel and increase forward speed for a few seconds.

Turbo is engaged with Afterburner.
Reduces the passive drain rate of an active overshield.
Nanite Systems' Tetra scope gives its users a significant advantage at target acquisition at mid to long ranges thanks to its triple chevron reticule and 4x magnification.

Each year, the sights of Auraximas stir the spirits of soldiers everywhere; a reminder to take time for one another, and focus not only on the war, but the world in which we fight it. Snowmen abound during the holiday season, and the battlescape is dotted with festive lights and decoration. Be sure to check the Depot for seasonal items, and the Directive tree for new challenges and rewards!
Unlocks a profile banner for your character.
Increases the braking performance of the Vanguard by 20%.
Use tier 2 implants to create a tier 3 implant!
The Rebel's Skull Helmet causes terror in those unfortunate enough to oppose its wearer. NC use only.
Applies a camo to your weapon. VS use only.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Lightning by 600 seconds.
Decreases the time needed to reload weapon by 8.75%
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 240 rounds.
Further increases the MAX's fire rate while in Overdrive.
Orphaned - Post Launch - Do not translate. Galaxy Inertial Dampener - Level 4
Customize your Flash with this glowing antenna ball. TR use only.
Adds this customization to your vehicle. Only NC can use this gear.
Wearable by Heavy Assault. NC use only.
Improves the vehicle's ability to engage ground targets by increasing its hover strength and power of vertical thrusters.
Apply the Dazzle Dizzy camo pattern to your armor. TR use only.
CS Gift: Squad Resource Boost - 1 Day
Turning this on enables the ability to toggle zoom with each click. (Default: Off)
Single Use Indar Canyons v2 Camo

Built off of the NS-11, the NS-15M1 is an accurate, magazine-fed LMG that performs well in most combat situations. The M1 was accidentally manufactured with a deep black paint, making it somewhat of a collectors item on Auraxis.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. VS use only.

An adaptive processing unit suppresses the "shimmer" effect that would normally occur upon taking damage while cloaked. A cloaked Infiltrator's personal shield will still visually "shatter" when depleted, but the module will re-route discharged power to the Infiltrator's fuel cells, instantly restoring 20% cloak energy.

The Orion VS54 is the standard issue LMG for Vanu Heavy Assault soldiers. Its lightweight construction allows for more accurate hip fire and stability when on the move when compared to most weapons in its class. VS use only.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.2 seconds.

The Reaver is a one man air superiority fighter in use exclusively by the New Conglomerate. Its powerful engines combined with its great afterburner capacity make this aircraft the fastest empire specific fighter in the skies.
Apply the Indar Highlands v2 camo pattern to your vehicle. All factions can use this gear.
Instantly restores Magrider's energy to full, and breaks lockon attempts in the process. Can be used once every 32 seconds.
Increases the rate of health restored by healing others.
A 12x magnitude zoom precision sniper scope.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. NC use only.
Earn this ribbon by providing spawns for your squad.
Select the speakers or headphones that you would like to use for voice chat
Apply the Dazzle Dizzy camo pattern to your armor. VS use only.

<font color="#00FFAA">Coordinator Tolland:</font> Hey, kid. We've got a lot of hard work ahead of us and not nearly enough time to get it all done. But with the esteemed backing of the Terran Republic, I'm sure we'll only be a few days late getting to Oshur.
Soldier, you havent seen action yet until you have joined a squad. Ask me again.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.6 seconds.
The muzzle velocity in meters per second.
Reduces damage taken from anti-tank mines by 40%.
The Militant's Skull Helmet causes terror in those unfortunate enough to oppose its wearer. TR use only.
The Adrenaline Pump increases sprint speed while equipped.
Allows 3 additional grenades of any type to be carried.
When activated, the Sunderer is encased in a coating that allows it to slip through enemy gate shields. Lasts 10 seconds. Can be activated once every 60 seconds.
Increases Jump Booster capacity to 5 and allows a second booster to be active at once.
Applies a Black Desert decal to your armor. All factions can use this gear.
Increases the overall handling of the Flash by 5%.
Further increases the range of the IFF Device
Increases the speed at which your shields regenerate to full by 33%.
Apply the Stripe camo pattern to your vehicle. NC use only.
Gunner Kill Assist Share - Engi Turret
Increases the ammo capacity of the weapon to 150 rounds.
Fireteams are disabled in Mentor squads.
Use different weapons to unlock more medals.
VS - Shared - Heavy Pistol - V4 Description(Delete Me -BB)
Additional composite plating to complement the look of your soldier. TR use only.
Increases the damage resistance to anti infantry weapons from 84.5% to 86%, this includes pistols, rifles, and vehicle mounted light machine guns.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a "J" Gold Hood Ornament.
Adds tire spikes to your Flash. NC use only.
Applies a camo to your armor, weapon or vehicle. NC use only.
Normal fall damage now starts at 30 meters and lethal fall damage starts near 90 meters. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip.</font>

Designed for use by the Terran Republic's top Infiltrator hit squads, the Shuriken's incredible flexibility both close-up and at a distance allowed TR assassins to deal with a multitude of situations they may've not survived otherwise.
NC: Customization - Sniper Rifle Bolt Driver Promo

Construction objects provide a variety of functions, and each cost Cortium to create; they can be placed throughout the world so long as they are outside a base's no-deploy zone. Construction objects decay slowly over time when unattended.
Access Amp Station consoles across Auraxis

Attention, soldier. Command wants you to run interference on Esamir and the other combat areas. We need time to develop new technology, and the resources to do that keep getting bogged down in our combat zones.
The End of the World (As We Know It)
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 15%
We've made the list and checked it twice. Each day in December features a sale or special item!
Eyes on hostile light assault trooper.
Apply the single use Pine Forest camo pattern to your weapon. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 33 rockets.

The more disabled vehicles we can recover on Esamir, the more energy resistant equipment we'll be able to create. Take that Neutralizer of yours, dissipate the energy on these vehicles to get them back up and running, then safely return them to our Warpgate, or Eisa Tech Plant, provided we own it. Most disabled vehicles can be located at the abandoned bases overtaken by snow, as well as in the northeastern area surrounding The Shattered Warpgate.
Primary Right: Anti-Vehicle: M3 Pounder HEG
The Proton II PPA-H fires large orbs of volatile plasma that explode on impact. The PPA is effective against infantry and light armor. VS use only.
Apply the Patriot camo pattern to your Vehicle. NC use only.
Increases the time required for seeking weapons to establish a lock by 0.75 seconds and reduces the mini-map auto-detect range of the vehicle to 25 meters.

This gold plated version of the Recon Detection Device fires darts which pulse every 3 seconds, momentarily detecting fast-moving enemies, including cloaked infiltrators, in a 30 meter radius for 25 seconds.
Reduces damage taken from frag grenades and common explosions by 50%.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.3 seconds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 75 rounds.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Reaver by 60 seconds.
Wearable by all non-Max classes. NC use only.
Unlocks access to the Reserve Hardlight Barrier. Heavy Assault only.

While deployed, shares the locations of enemy infantry within 40 meters every 1.5 seconds; the Infiltrator also receives live movement updates of enemies within 20 meters. Lasts 180 seconds, three can be carried.
Apply the Woven Web camo pattern to your armor. TR use only.
Uses the MAX's fully charged capacitor to temporarily supercharge their movement servos, allowing the user to mount an assault or quickly dash to cover
NC - Sniper Rifle - Mid - V9 Description(Delete Me -BB)
Kill enemies using any weapon in any position while in a Galaxy.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.4 seconds.
For those who desire more precision in close quarters, the Fenmont reflex optic offers a 2x zoom.
The Deconstructor can repair friendly armor and damage enemy vehicles
RNGTEK's Nx1 nightvision optic provides an advantage in low-light conditions, illuminating nearby targets.
Greetings, operative. We have assigned you #count([*cert_points*]). Allocate them wisely.
Retain at least 41% territory control to lock Indar.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 480 rounds.

Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 600 rounds.

Water balloons approved for both recreational and combat use.

Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 60 rounds.

Burn fuel to increase the Magrider's top speed for up to 1 second. Fuel recharges from zero to full in 35 seconds.

Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.2 seconds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 75 rounds.
Improves thruster efficiency, increasing total air time by 11 seconds.
VS: Customization - Sniper Rifle Bolt Driver Promo
This RNGTEK reflex sight has increased magnification for detailed target acquisition.
Destroy the Shield Console in the Hydroponics Lab

The Bishop marksman rifle uses signature ammunition coupled with advanced charge coils to pierce through multiple targets in a single shot. In addition, its heavy damage and controllability make it ideal for long-range engagements. NC use only.
Receiving damage from a standard explosive, light anti-vehicle, C4, or infantry launcher will trigger a shield that reduces damage from all of those resistance types by 50% for 20 seconds.
Press [%s] to access light vehicle terminal
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 560 rounds.
Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon restores 325 health. This effect does not trigger on quick melee attacks.
This training program can be accessed at any time from your help menu should you wish to return at a later time.
Adds the Baron style hubcaps to your Flash. VS use only.
Grenade Bandolier has been removed from your Infiltrator and its cert cost refunded.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 15%

This is a map of the war zone. The flashing hotspots to the west indicate there is an active battle at Outpost Echo.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 32 grenades.

<font color="#00FFAA">Praetor Umatherin:</font> Walking across the ocean floor is undoubtedly slower than standard ground transit, but it will be more difficult to detect than an assault by land, sea, or air.
Single Use Scrub Forest Weapon Camo
Failed to set the squad leader.
Carry an additional motion spotter, four total. Only one can be active at a time per infiltrator.
Reduces damage taken from frag grenades and common explosions by 50%; and infantry rockets, light anti-vehicle, and air-to-ground explosives by 20%.
Decreases muzzle flash and audio range.
NC - Sniper Rifle - Long - V11 Description(Delete Me -BB)
Apply the 艾美瑞什 Scrub camo pattern to your armor. All factions can use this gear.
This ammunition depot is where you can resupply ammunition for ground vehicles. Resupply is automatic when close to the depot.Vehicle resupply depots also have icons on your minimap and HUD.
You must wait [*seconds*] more seconds before issuing another order.
Creates a long lasting smoke screen around the aircraft that disrupts visibility and lock-ons for 8 seconds.

This SR-100 has been modified to facilitate the ongoing experimentation with photonic propulsion. A heavier slug with a prototype micro-engine has yielded promising results in long-range stopping power.
Reclaim disabled vehicles by using the Neutralizer Device on them.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 15 rockets.
Applies a decal to your armor or vehicle. VS use only.

This experimental laser weapon can tear through enemies with sustained fire, but an interesting side effect causes a build up of residual energy while firing that can be harnessed into a devastating blast.
Heavy Nano-Repair Module increases the MAX's automatic repair rate in exchange for mobility and armor
Additional composite plating to complement the look of your soldier. NC use only.
